tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_performance_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latency_ms FLOAT,
  bandwidth_usage_mb FLOAT,
  packet_loss DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE network_performance_summary (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    average_latency_ms FLOAT,
    average_bandwidth_usage_mb FLOAT,
    average_packet_loss_percent FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);
